original_text: Yea, they that feed of the portion of his meat shall destroy him, and his army shall overflow: and many shall fall down slain.
korean_text: 그의 음식을 먹는 자들이 그를 멸하리니 그의 군대가 흩어질 것이요 많은 사람이 엎드러져 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: Yea, they that feed of the portion of his meat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 양식의 분배를 받는 자들이

sentences.original_text: and many shall fall down slain
